attributes.action: make it mandatory, for all schools/places of employment to introduce a daily 20 minute nap break
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In Europe and further afield (i.e Japan) it has long been remarked upon, that they employ 'nap breaks' as part of their daily work routine, to enhance efficiency and diligence in the workplace. Alas, no contingency has been implemented in the united kingdom... hopefully we can learn from our international cousins. (and introduce it to schools too)
